data.title: AgnosPCB Inspection Tool software – AgnosPCB
data.text:
AgnosPCB Inspection Tool software

LINUX OS

Changelog 5.5.X :

IMPORTANT: Let the software know if it made a mistake inspecting the circuit: place the cursor on top of the mistake and press the UP arrow. It will learn from the mistakes.

Mosaic now contains up to 24 REFERENCE images: Now you can store 24 different images of REFERENCE files in the mosaic

Sensitivity:

PDF report creation

Barcode reader

UUI to REFERENCE

Minor bugs fixed

More info about the new features includedhere

WINDOWS OS VERSION DOES NOT SUPPORT CAMERA REMOTE CONTROL

Changelog 4.1.3:

IMPORTANT: Let the software know if it made a mistake inspecting the circuit: place the cursor on top of the mistake and press the UP arrow. It will learn from the mistakes.

AUTO-CROP: now, the software crops the image around the PCBA/panel automatically. That reduces the inspection time considerably.

Improved stability

Faults detected: now, when moving among faults with the left and right arrow keys, they will automatically change its color to GREEN. Click again to change to WHITE color.

Compatible with the latest neural network architecture

Minor bugs fixed

Changelog 4.0.14:

IMPORTANT: Let the software know if it made a mistake inspecting the circuit: place the cursor on top of the mistake and press the UP arrow. It will learn from the mistakes.

Improved stability

New image processing core (please take new photos of the REFERENCE PCBA to make use of this new improvement)

Faults detected: now, when moving among faults with the left and right arrow keys, they will automatically change its color to GREEN. Click again to change to WHITE color.

Compatible with the latest neural network architecture

New POP-UP messages with TIPS

Minor bugs fixed

Changelog 4.0.5:

IMPORTANT: Let the software know if it made a mistake inspecting the circuit: place the cursor on top of the mistake and press the UP arrow. It will learn from the mistakes.

Improved stability

Minor bugs fixed

Changelog 4.0.1:

IMPORTANT: Let the software know if it made a mistake inspecting the circuit: place the cursor on top of the mistake and press the UP arrow. It will learn from the mistakes.

Jump among faults detected, pressing the <- and -> arrow keys of the keyboard.

Now, the UNIT UNDER INSPECTION (UUI) can be maximized to full screen (automatically after taking the photo)

Click on the photo thumbnail to switch between REFERENCE photo and Unit Under Inspection photo

Improved stability

Minor bugs fixed

Changelog 3.17.9:

Now, the UNIT UNDER INSPECTION (UUI) can be maximized to full screen (automatically after taking the photo)

Now clicking on the image will enlarge it

Corrected a bug related with a Windows OS latest updates (access to files in a folder)

Corrected a bug when using images larger than recommended

Improved stability

Minor bugs fixed

Changelog 3.17.6:

NEW User interface

The “time-out” error message will appear after 30 seconds. Allowing to get inspection results with slow internet connection.

Revamped UI

Now the circuit/panel images are 20% bigger

Improved stability

Image alignment is 80% faster

Minor bugs fixed

Changelog 3.16:

NEW FEATURE: error report

NEW User interface

Added ZOOM using the mouse’s wheel

Now the circuit/panel images are 20% bigger

Improved stability

Image alignment is 190% faster

Minor bugs fixed

Changelog 2.7.3:

Faster access for data exchange to our AWS servers

Minor bugs fixed

Changelog 2.7.2:

Faster mapping algorithm

Added time watchdogs

Timeouts increased

Improved stability

Minor bugs fixed

Changelog 2.40:

Improved image translation/ rotation algorithm

Added time watchdogs

Minor bugs fixed

Changelog 1.30:

Solved a problem related to UI display

Faster image mapping

Improved stability

Changelog 1.27:

Solved a bug loading certain images with non-existent EXIF file

Changelog 1.26:

BATCH process Optimized

Minor bugs fixed

Ready for new neural network architecture

Changelog 1.23:

Optimizations when uploading the images

Fixed the BUG that generated inconsistent state.

CROP BUG fixed

BATCH processing now shows progress in all states

Now BATCH REVIEW shows the original master and allows you to continue with the workflow.

Some minor bugs fixed
